decision_conditions: Satisfactory evidence has been submitted, as required under Section 191 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended by section 10 of the Planning & Compensation Act 1991), to demonstrate that works in relation to planning permission P/2002/2301 dated 25.04.2003 for "Conversion into 6 residential units with parking" has begun before the expiration date stipulated on the decision notice for extant permission P/2009/4364 dated 06/07/2010 for "Application to extend the time limit for implementation to 15th February 2013 of outline planning permission ref: P/2002/2301 granted at appeal (ref: APP/A5270/A/02/1/00358) for conversion into 6 residential units with parking". As such, the development is immune from planning enforcement and is lawful.
The Planning Permission must be carried out in accordance with all other conditions and requirements under the legal agreement that are attached to this consent.
description: Confirmation of implementation of planning permission P/2002/2301 dated 25.04.2003 for "Conversion into 6 residential units with parking"(Lawful Development Certificate for an Existing Development)
